name: Doggy Dragging
statusText: Aroused by the hot scent of Ceris' ass.
outcome: [AttackerName] drags her nether regions forward across [TargetName]'s face, before burying [TargetHimOrHer] in her ass and forcing the adventurer to deeply inhale her scent.
